features: ⛄2 in 1 Brush & Scraper- Floor scrub brush with squeegee side was great for removing water so the dirt didn’t resettle after scrubbing and rinsing, Scraping water and brush your floor at the same time, clean and dry with a single wipe! Finish your cleaning job quickly.

⛄Easy put together and store-Floor scrubber brush with long Poles could be locked via threaded joints easy to rotate and fix , the top of the handle with a hanging hole, the brush can be hanged on the bathroom wall, space-saving design for easy next use.

⛄59''Adjustment Long Handle- Deck scrubber broom is adjustable with 3 poles from125CM- 150CM, you could adjust height of brush according to your needs.say goodbye to aching back and knees with our premium floor scrub brush with long handle

⛄Multiple Occasion Applied- Deck cleaning brush with long handle Works perfectly for hard wooden floor, deeply clean bathroom tiles plus the grout , swimming pool, kitchen, carpet of animal hairs, balcony deck, sidewalk, patio, garage, and other outdoor occasions.
⛄Efficient Stiff Bristle- 7 row dense brush bristle are made from durable nylon, durable and not easy to deform, hard enough to cleaning stubborn stains yet not scratch the surface

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good for hardwood floors and carpet!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use telescoping bristle brush broom with telescoping hand
reviews.reviewText: This bristle brush broom with telescoping handle was easy to assemble and start using. I like that we can use the broom to clean the basement, garage or other areas where there is lots of dust and dirt.There's also a reverse side squeegee if you want to push away or clear away water in your basement or garage towards your drain.The broom handle is well-made and easy to grip and push with. There's also a nice hook on the handle that you can hang the broom when you are not using it.It worked well for us and did a good job cleaning our garage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: Would prefer more power/speed but good for lower price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this brush to use in my backyard my husband was really interested in getting a push broom and so when I saw this item I thought you know it would work and do the job and when I came in the description is not accurate because yes it's tall like the height matches the description but the brush size is probably only maybe 6 to 8 inches and it's really frustrating trying to use outdoors because it's just too small the squeegee on it is fine as it works but the thing for me is that if you're buying this for like a push broom it's not worth the money you could probably get anything else that will work better than this item so just keep that in mind
